comment.author: 41909278@N08
comment._content:
A famous photo. This particular shot of T-6G 49-3143 was used as a publicity handout by North American Aviation and has been published many times. Interestingly, a few months prior to the commencement of the T-6G program, NAA had revamped some T-6Ds for Greece and the T-6's replacement, the T-28, had already entered production.

Doug MacPhail
